title: Drugs Approved for Cervical Cancer
description: This page lists cancer drugs approved by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) for cervical cancer. The list includes generic names, brand names, and common drug combinations, which are shown in capital letters. The drug names link to NCI's Cancer Drug Information summaries.
cleaned_text: Drugs Approved for Cervical Cancer This page lists cancer drugs approved by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) for cervical cancer. The list includes generic names and brand names. This page also lists common drug combinations used in cervical cancer. The individual drugs in the combinations are FDA-approved. However, the drug combinations themselves usually are not approved, although they are widely used. The drug names link to NCI's Cancer Drug Information summaries. There may be drugs used in cervical cancer that are not listed here. Drugs Approved to Prevent Cervical Cancer [Cervarix
